title: (x) LaserStar logo - Corinthian, Linotype Ergo {Allison (self), Jan E}
content:
I need both fonts featured in this logo.  
I recognized the font for 'Laser' which is the Corinthian.  
But for 'Star' I'm still left in the cold,...  
SO I hope you font recognizers can help!

Thanks, A+
